comments: Write any 8-bit value to this register to reset the mixer chip. After a reset, all the registers will be restored to their default values.

Bits 3-1: Master volume

3 bits, giving 8 levels.
0 to 7 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 4 dB steps.
Default is 4 ⇒ – 11 dB.

Bits 3-1: MIDI volume

3 bits, giving 8 levels.
0 to 7 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 4 dB steps.
Default is 4 ⇒ – 11 dB.

Bits 3-1: CD volume

3 bits, giving 8 levels.
0 to 7 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 4 dB steps.
Default is 0 ⇒ – 46 dB.

Bits 2-1: Voice volume

2 bits, giving 4 levels.
0 to 3 ⇒ – 46 dB to 0 dB, in approximate 7 dB steps.
Default is 0 ⇒ – 46 dB.
